meaning: Fail on the verge of success
description: To fail at the last moment despite good progress. Idiom meaning 「to fall short of success at the last stage」.

examples.chinese: 这次最终导致功败垂成
examples.translation: This time it ultimately led to failure on the verge of success.

examples.chinese: 绝杀时刻的失误,恐怕导致功败垂成
examples.translation: A mistake at the buzzer beater moment, afraid it leads to snatching defeat from the jaws of victory.

examples.chinese: 朋友和我说了恋爱已经快要进入婚姻,最后却功败垂成的事情
examples.translation: My friend told me about how their relationship was heading towards marriage but failed at the last hurdle.
